title: Journey Step Event
description: This Class will have Journey Step Fields

reentrance.title: reentrance
reentrance.description: Indicate if the user has reentered the journey with the same instance. If not present, assuming that the value is false

instanceEnded.title: instanceEnded
instanceEnded.description: Indicate if the Journey instance has ended
